home.parrafo-info: I am a computer engineer specializing in web application development, with four years of experience in Back-End development and almost a year in Front-End development. My focus is on creating creative, efficient, and robust solutions that meet the needs of users and businesses.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am a computer engineer passionate about programming. I have been exploring web application development for four years, both in Back-End and Front-End.
I aspire to find a job in the Web Development world, gain experience, acquire new knowledge, and strengthen my professional life.

I am an empathetic and enthusiastic person, with skills focused on teamwork, effective communication, problem-solving, responsibility, and proactivity. I enjoy learning from others and continuously improving myself.

formacion.title: Training
formacion.formacion3: Accounting for Commercial and Financial Transactions

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: A dynamic application that, through a code, allows users to search for a superhero and view information about the searched character. It includes characters from Marvel and DC.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a bit about my background.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: A game where you must guess the name of a Pokémon by only seeing its silhouette. The application displays 20 Pokémon with a filter that makes it difficult to clearly identify which Pokémon it is.
